name: Ackim Chisha
bio: Visionary leader with 15+ years in tech. Former Head - Core Banking and Enterprise Applications at Zanaco, passionate about building solutions that make a difference.
longBio: Ackim is a visionary leader who founded iZyane with the mission to democratize technology and make it accessible to businesses of all sizes. With over 15 years of experience in the technology industry, he previously served as Vice President of Product at Google, where he led teams responsible for developing cutting-edge consumer and enterprise solutions. Ackim holds an MBA from Stanford and a Computer Science degree from MIT. He's passionate about mentoring the next generation of tech leaders and believes that technology should be a force for positive change in the world.
achievements: Led $50M product initiative at Google
Featured in Forbes 40 Under 40
TEDx speaker on technology and leadership
Advisor to 3 successful tech startups

name: Mirriam Mwale
bio: Operational excellence leader with expertise in business strategy, process optimization, and organizational development. Scaling operations for high-growth companies.
longBio: Mirriam brings deep operational expertise and strategic leadership to iZyane. As our Chief Operating Officer, she oversees all operational aspects of the business and ensures efficient execution of company strategy. Previously, she was VP of Operations at a Fortune 500 company and led organizational transformation initiatives at Microsoft. Mirriam specializes in scaling operations, building efficient processes, and developing high-performing teams. She holds an MBA in Operations Management from Wharton and is passionate about operational excellence.
education: B.S. Business Administration - University of Zambia
achievements: Led operational transformation for 500+ person company
Reduced operational costs by 30% while scaling 3x
Implemented agile processes across 15 teams
Operations Excellence Award 2023

name: Chiselwa Mwansompelo
bio: Certified public accountant with expertise in financial reporting, tax compliance, and business analytics. Ensuring financial accuracy and regulatory compliance.
longBio: Chiselwa is our dedicated accountant who ensures financial accuracy and compliance across all business operations. With over 8 years of experience in accounting and financial management, she brings expertise in financial reporting, tax compliance, and budgeting. Previously, she worked at PwC as a senior auditor and later managed financial operations at a growing tech startup. Chiselwa is passionate about leveraging technology to streamline financial processes and provide actionable business insights through data analysis.
achievements: Managed financial operations for $10M+ revenue company
Streamlined accounting processes reducing errors by 95%
Led successful financial audits with zero findings
Implemented automated reporting systems

name: Zawadi Kayoka
bio: Full-stack developer with expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Leading technical architecture and mentoring development teams.
longBio: Zawadi is a passionate technical leader who brings expertise in building scalable web applications and leading development teams. With 8 years of experience at leading fintech and e-commerce companies, she has a deep understanding of building systems that handle millions of users. At Stripe, she worked on payment processing infrastructure, and at Shopify, she led the development of merchant-facing tools. Zawadi is known for her attention to detail, clean code practices, and ability to mentor junior developers while driving technical excellence.
education: B.S. Software Engineering - University of Zambia
achievements: Built payment system handling $10B+ annually
Open source contributor (React ecosystem)
Tech lead for team of 12 developers
Certified AWS Solutions Architect

name: Niza Tembo
bio: Engineering leader with expertise in software architecture, team management, and scalable system design. Building robust engineering processes and culture.
longBio: Niza is an experienced engineering leader who drives technical excellence and team development at iZyane. With a strong background in software engineering and team leadership, she specializes in building scalable systems and establishing engineering best practices. Previously, she led engineering teams at Microsoft and worked on large-scale distributed systems. Niza is passionate about mentoring engineers, implementing agile methodologies, and ensuring code quality while fostering a collaborative engineering culture.
education: M.S. Computer Science - University of Zambia
achievements: Led engineering team through 200% growth
Reduced deployment failures by 85%
Implemented engineering best practices across 5 teams
Mentored 15+ engineers to senior positions

name: Mwangilwa Zimba
bio: Frontend specialist with expertise in React, Vue.js, and modern web technologies. Creating exceptional user interfaces and leading frontend architecture.
longBio: Mwangilwa is our lead frontend engineer who creates beautiful and performant user interfaces. With expertise in modern frontend frameworks and user experience design, he leads the development of responsive, accessible web applications. Previously, he worked at leading tech companies building consumer-facing applications used by millions. Mwangilwa is passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and staying current with the latest frontend technologies and best practices.
education: B.S. Computer Science - University of Zambia
achievements: Built responsive web apps used by 1M+ users
Improved frontend performance by 60%
Led frontend architecture for 3 major products
Speaker at Frontend Development Conference

name: Emmanuel Tembo
bio: Senior software engineer with expertise in backend development, API design, and database optimization. Building scalable and maintainable software solutions.
longBio: Emmanuel is a skilled senior software engineer who specializes in backend development and system architecture. With extensive experience in building robust APIs, optimizing database performance, and implementing scalable solutions, he ensures our applications perform efficiently under load. Previously, he worked on high-traffic systems at major tech companies. Emmanuel is passionate about clean architecture, test-driven development, and mentoring junior developers.
education: B.S. Computer Science - University of Zambia
achievements: Designed APIs handling 50M+ requests daily
Optimized database queries improving speed by 70%
Led backend development for 2 major projects
Mentored 5 junior developers to mid-level positions

name: Naphtali Phiri
bio: UI/UX engineer specializing in user interface design, user experience research, and frontend implementation. Creating intuitive and accessible digital experiences.
longBio: Naphtali is a talented UI/UX engineer who bridges the gap between design and development. With expertise in user interface design, user experience research, and frontend implementation, he creates intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences. Naphtali specializes in design systems, accessibility standards, and translating design concepts into functional code. He's passionate about user-centered design and ensuring that technology is accessible to everyone.
education: B.A. Graphic Design - University of Zambia
achievements: Designed user interfaces for 10+ web applications
Improved user engagement by 40% through UX research
Created comprehensive design system used company-wide
Winner of Regional UX Design Award 2023

name: Kasweka Michael Mukoko
bio: Software developer with expertise in full-stack development, mobile applications, and modern web technologies. Building innovative solutions with clean, maintainable code.
longBio: Kasweka is a dedicated software developer who brings enthusiasm and technical skills to our development team. With experience in both web and mobile application development, he contributes to building user-friendly applications using modern technologies. Kasweka is passionate about learning new technologies, writing clean code, and collaborating with team members to deliver high-quality software solutions. He's always eager to take on new challenges and grow his technical expertise.
education: B.S. Computer Science - University of Zambia
achievements: Developed 5+ mobile applications with 4.5+ star ratings
Contributed to open source projects with 100+ stars
Reduced app crashes by 80% through testing improvements
Completed advanced React Native certification
